name: Replace Mr. Jingles (use your own image)
description:
This user style replaces the Mr. Jingles icon in the Google Plus notification widget.
You need to provide your own image for replacing.
additional_info:
You need to edit the CSS code to replace and fit the image size. You can upload your image to any online image-sharing service such as imgur or minus, and put the image URL into CSS code.
Edit the "url" content of "background" to replace the image.
Edit the "height" value to fit the image height.
Edit the "padding-left" value to fit the image width.

2013-10-05 Updated for new class name.
2013-10-16 Updated for new class name.
